title: #33 Hecz's Opinion on "Content Houses" and his BIG Connection to Michael Jordan and "The Last Dance"
itunes:title: #33 Hecz's Opinion on "Content Houses" and his BIG Connection to Michael Jordan and "The Last Dance"
description: On this remote episode of The CouRage and Nadeshot Show presented by Cash App, Hecz joins to discuss his transition from OpTiC to NRG, if content house's still work in the current YouTube landscape, the new Huntsman vs the old OpTiC, being a father, & more!
